Episodes.Title: Al-Baqara
Episodes.Plot: Darwyn is trying to start a new life with his family but ends up back in another LA sleeper cell. Farik refuses to give up any information despite interrogation, and Darwyn's female FBI handler is kidnapped and beheaded in the sudan by terrorists.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Deborah Vancelette,  Patrick St. Esprit,  Aasif Mandvi,  Yasmine Hanani,  Sean Hampton,  Mike Batayeh,  Michael Desante,  Kevin Alejandro,  Omid Abtahi,  Thekla Reuten,  Scott Vance

Episodes.Title: Salesman
Episodes.Plot: The cell establishes its base and tries to get a rocket launcher while Farik foils another attempt at getting him to cooperate.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Thekla Reuten,  Jay R. Ferguson,  Kevin Alejandro,  Omid Abtahi

Episodes.Title: Torture
Episodes.Plot: Darwyn is ordered by a terrorist group to get a weapon, but the FBI doesn't want to cooperate. Ilija gets ready to run away to Europe.  Farik is sent to Saudi Arabia where  torture is allowed.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Daniel Kash,  Sarah Shahi,  Jay R. Ferguson,  Vinicius Machado

Episodes.Title: Faith
Episodes.Plot: Darwyn risks blowing his cover to save an Islamic televangelist. Farik escapes from prison is Saudi Arabia and finds a place to hide with Al-Queda.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, sex scenes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Rady, Omid Abtahi, Kevin Alejandro, Jay R. Ferguson, Nicholas Kadi, Navid Negahban, Sarah Shahi, Faran Tahir

Episodes.Title: Home
Episodes.Plot: Darwyn notifies the FBI that nuclear material is supposed to be delivered to LA.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual violence, offensive language & sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Julie Ariola, Jasmine Di Angelo, Jay R. Ferguson, Nicholas Kadi, Michael Rady, Savannah Stehlin, Saïd Taghmaoui

Episodes.Title: School
Episodes.Plot: Darwyn has to work with the new cell leader who doesn't include him in planning the next attack.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual violence, offensive language & sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Daniel Kash, Julie Ariola, Anthony Azizi, Ismail Bashey, Yvette Nicole Brown, Johnny Sneed, Savannah Stehlin, Saïd Taghmaoui, Tessa Vonn

Episodes.Title: Fitna
Episodes.Plot: The FBI and Darwyn decide to move in an intercept the cell in their plan to detonate the two dirty bombs in Los Angeles on July 4th. However, Darwyn soon faces a pair of tragedies he did not see coming.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual violence, offensive language & sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Saïd Taghmaoui, Michael Rady, Nicholas Kadi, Yvette Nicole Brown

Episodes.Title: Reunion
Episodes.Plot: Darwyn ends up blaming himself for the tragedies that just happened to him and decides it is time to confront Farik, by using the leader's wife as bait.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual violence, offensive language & sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Patrick St. Esprit, Alain  Uy, Philip Shahbaz, Eden Rountree, Anthony Molinari, Julie Michaels, Shepard Koster, Anna Khaja, Ismail Kanater, Shannon Jarrell, Mel Fair, Susan Pari
